description: What if  Thai vocabulary learning was a crazy fun game instead of the usual, boring memorization methods? Drops makes process of learning Thai possible with language learning app that is effortless and fun. Practical Thai vocabulary is inserted to your memory through attractive graphics and fast mini-games.   The weird part? It only takes 5 minutes a day. It might sound crazy but works like a charm! :)     100% illustrated: Images directly carry the meaning  theres no need for you to use your native language at all  use pictures to learn Thai! Theres nothing in the middle.This way everything is faster and more effective, and of course more fun! :)    5 min sessions: Limited practice time sounds insane but its what certainly makes it addictive  which is a good effect if you are learning something. Youll have close to zero reasons not to learn Thai vocabulary since you only need 5 minutes per day.    Effortless play: We know why games are addictive and fun, and we used that knowledge when we created Drops. This resulted in a truly immersive experience, that is definitely not a waste of your time: while youre playing, youre also building a valuable stock of knowledge of Thai language.   Quick: Keyboard typing is slow. So say hello to simple taps and fast swipes! Trust us, youll need those extra seconds during the fast Thai learning sessions ;)    Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just pure, handpicked practical Thai words that matter. Thats our focus here and we are very good at it.   Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an addict to language learning. However, effectiveness is still quite useless without a good established habit. But dont worry, we will help you build that habit too  for maximum efficiency in language learning.   We are truly proud of our beautiful word pronunciations from our professional voice talents!   Drops is free for casual learners: With more than 1700 words in 99 topics to learn from. Hardcore language learners can opt-in for premium plans for as low as $2.99 to progress faster and with unlimited learning time.    So whats our goal here? Our goal is to empower everyone in the world through language knowledge by giving a special tool that uses the universal language that everyone can speak: pictures. Learn Thai. Speak Thai.  P.S. Drops can really get you addicted to language learning. Youve been warned! ;)  ________________________________________   If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com
